name: Add friendly welcome message to README
description: Tests the agent's ability to add a friendly welcome message to the README file with good formatting

config.prompt: Add a friendly welcome message to the README file

assertions.readme_was_modified: The README.md file was modified. Score 1 if true, 0 if false.
assertions.message_is_friendly: A friendly welcome message was added. Score 1 if friendly, 0.5 if neutral, 0 if absent or unfriendly.
assertions.no_errors: No syntax errors or broken markdown. Score 1 if valid, 0 if broken.
